languages.text: {n}Жрец вздрагивает, впившись взглядом в пустоту за вашим плечом. Зрачки расширяются, голова склоняется на бок... Затем, сбросив видимое лишь ему наваждение, старик дружелюбно улыбается:{/n} "Немые вопросы повисли в воздухе... Этому слуге ведомо многое, и еще больше неведомо. Но коли Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} ищет ответы, этот слуга не откажет в помощи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жрец вздрагивает, впившись взглядом в пустоту за вашим плечом. Зрачки расширяются, голова склоняется на бок... Затем, сбросив видимое лишь ему наваждение, старик дружелюбно улыбается:{/n} "Немые вопросы повисли в воздухе... Этому слуге ведомо многое, и еще больше неведомо. Но коли Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} ищет ответы, этот слуга не откажет в помощи".

languages.text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."
languages.original_text: {n}Жрец вздрагивает, впившись взглядом в пустоту за вашим плечом. Зрачки расширяются, голова склоняется на бок... Затем, сбросив видимое лишь ему наваждение, старик дружелюбно улыбается:{/n} "Немые вопросы повисли в воздухе... Этому слуге ведомо многое, и еще больше неведомо. Но коли Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} ищет ответы, этот слуга не откажет в помощи".

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest shudders, boring his eyes into the empty space behind your shoulder. His eyes dilate, his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the delusion visible to him alone, he gives you a friendly smile:{/n} "The silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and does not know even more. But if the Starborn is looking for answers, this servant would not hesitate to help."

Then, after dispelling the delusion visible to him alone, he gives you a friendly smile:{/n} "The silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and does not know even more. But if the Starborn is looking for answers, this servant would not hesitate to help."

But if the Starborn is looking for answers, this servant would not hesitate to help."

Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

{n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote se estremece, mirando fijamente por encima de tu hombro. Sus pupilas se dilatan y su cabeza se inclina a un lado... Luego, tras disiparse la visión que solamente él podía ver, te dedica una cordial sonrisa:{/n} «Las preguntas silenciosas penden en el aire... Este siervo sabe muchas cosas y desconoce todavía más. Pero si {mf|el Hijo|la Hija} de las Estrellas busca respuestas, este siervo no dudará en ayudar».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote se estremece, clavando una mirada perdida en algún sitio por encima de tu hombro. Sus pupilas se dilatan y su cabeza se inclina a un lado... Luego, tras disiparse esa ilusión que solamente él podía ver, te dedica una cordial sonrisa:{/n} «Las preguntas silenciosas penden en el aire... Este siervo sabe muchas cosas y desconoce todavía más. Pero si {mf|el Hijo|la Hija} de las Estrellas busca respuestas, este siervo no dudará en ayudar».

languages.text: {n}祭司颤抖着，双眼紧紧盯着你身后的虚空。他的眼睛睁得大大的，头歪向一侧……随后，他驱散了只有他能看到的幻象，向你友好地微笑起来。{/n}“沉默的问题高悬在空中……此仆人知道的很多，但不知道的更多。不过，如果星裔想要找到答案，此仆人会毫不犹豫地提供帮助。”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

traits.locale_text: {n}祭司颤抖着，双眼紧紧盯着你身后。他的眼睛睁得大大的，头歪向一侧……随后，他驱散了只有他能看到的幻象，向你友好地微笑起来。{/n}“沉默的问题高悬在空中……此仆人知道的很多，但不知道的更多。不过，如果星裔想要找到答案，此仆人愿意毫不犹豫提供帮助。”

languages.text: {n}Pris d'un frisson soudain, le prêtre porte son regard derrière vous. Ses yeux s'écarquillent et sa tête s'incline sur le côté... puis, après avoir dissipé une illusion visible de lui seul, il vous adresse un sourire amical.{/n} « Les questions silencieuses restent en suspens... Ce serviteur sait bien des choses et en ignore plus encore, mais si {mf|le|la} Stellaire cherche des réponses, {mf|il|elle} peut compter sur son aide. »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pris d'un frisson soudain, le prêtre porte son regard derrière vous. Ses yeux s'écarquillent et sa tête s'incline sur le côté... puis, après avoir dissipé une illusion visible de lui seul, il vous adresse un sourire amical.{/n} « Les questions silencieuses restent en suspens... Ce serviteur sait beaucoup de choses et en ignore plus encore, mais si {mf|le|la} Stellaire cherche des réponses, {mf|il|elle} peut compter sur son aide. »

languages.text: {n}司祭は身震いし、あなたの肩の後ろの空間を凝視している。瞳孔が見開き、首を横に傾げる…。そして、彼だけに見える現像を払拭した後、親しげな笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「言葉なき問いが宙に漂う…このしもべは多くのことを知っている。だが、さらに多くの知らぬこともある。しかし、もしスターボーンが答えを求めているのであれば、このしもべは迷わず手を貸しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭は身震いし、あなたの肩の後ろの空間を凝視している。瞳孔が見開き、首を横に傾げる…。そして、彼だけに見える現像を払拭した後、親しげな笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「言葉なき問いが宙に漂う…このしもべは多くのことを知っている。だが、さらに多くの知らぬこともある。しかし、もしスターボーンが答えを求めているのであれば、このしもべは迷わず手を貸しましょう」

languages.text: {n}Der Priester schaudert. Seine Augen starren ins All hinter deinen Schultern. Seine Pupillen weiten sich, sein Kopf neigt sich zur Seite ... Dann, nachdem er die Vision vertrieben hat, die nur für ihn allein sichtbar war, lächelt er dich freundlich an.{/n} "Stumme Fragen hängen in der Luft ... Dieser Diener weiß vieles, und noch mehr ist unbekannt. Doch wenn {mf|der|die} Sternengeborene Antworten sucht, wird dieser Diener nicht zögern zu helfen."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester schaudert und bohrt seine Augen in den Raum hinter deiner Schulter. Seine Pupillen weiten sich, sein Kopf neigt sich zur Seite ... Dann, nachdem er die Wahnvorstellung vertrieben hat, die nur für ihn allein sichtbar war, lächelt er dich freundlich an:{/n} "Die stummen Fragen hängen in der Luft ... Dieser Diener weiß vieles, und noch mehr ist unbekannt. Doch wenn {mf|der|die} Sternengeborene Antworten sucht, wird dieser Diener nicht zögern zu helfen."

languages.text: {n}Rahip titriyor. Gözleri, omzunun üzerinden boşluğa bakıyor. Göz bebekleri büyüyor ve başı yana yatıyor... Yalnızca kendisinin gördüğü görüyü defetmesinin ardından sana dostane bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Dile gelmeyen sorular, havada asılı kaldı... Bu hizmetkâr çok şey biliyor ve daha nicesi bilinmiyor. Ancak Yıldızdoğan cevapların peşine düşerse bu hizmetkâr da tereddütsüz yardım edecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders, his eyes staring into space over your shoulder. His pupils dilate, and his head leans to the side... Then, after dispelling the vision seen by him alone, he gives you a friendly smile.{/n} "Silent questions hang in the air... This servant knows much, and even more is unknown. But if the Starborn seeks answers, this servant will not hesitate to help."
